text: Rimsky-Korsakov () is a 1953 Soviet drama movie directed by Gennadi Kazansky and Grigori Roshal.Римский-КорсаковРимский-Корсаков (1953) It stars Grigori Belov, Nikolai Cherkasov, and Aleksandr Borisov. ==Actors== * Grigori Belov as Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov * Nikolai Cherkasov as Vladimir Stasov * Aleksandr Borisov as Savva Mamontov * Liliya Gritsenko as Nadezhda Zabela-Vrubel * Viktor Khokhryakov as Alexander Glazunov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1953 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Gennadi Kazansky Category:Movies directed by Grigori Roshal
title: Rimsky-Korsakov (movie)
